sentences.en: A union would infuse unnecessary conflict into the company'semployee relations.
sentences.cn: 工会会把不必要的冲突带入公司员工关系当中。

sentences.en: Don't involve yourself in unnecessary dispute.
sentences.cn: 不要把自己卷入无谓的争论中.

sentences.en: He accused Diana of making an unnecessary fuss.
sentences.cn: 他责备黛安娜没必要那么大惊小怪。

sentences.en: He cancelled many unnecessary words in his manuscript.
sentences.cn: 他把原稿上许多多余的词删掉.

sentences.en: He found it unnecessary for us to stay behind.
sentences.cn: 他感到我们不必要留下来.

sentences.en: In writing this report I have omitted all unnecessary details.
sentences.cn: 在写这份报告时,我把一切不必要的细节全都删除了.

sentences.en: It's unnecessary to go into details.
Please, Mary, this is all so unnecessary.
sentences.cn: 玛丽，请不要这样，这完全没必要。

sentences.en: The accountant checked this unnecessary spending in good time.
sentences.cn: 会计及时卡住了这笔不必要的开支.

sentences.en: The barbaric slaughter of whales is unnecessary and inhuman.
sentences.cn: 对鲸的野蛮屠杀既不必要也不人道。

sentences.en: There’s no point in taking unnecessary risks.
sentences.cn: 冒不必要的风险没什么意义。

sentences.en: They were found guilty of causing unnecessary suffering to animals.
sentences.cn: 他们因虐待动物而被判有罪。

sentences.en: They will be concerned to cut back expenditure on unnecessary items.
sentences.cn: 他们将会考虑削减不必要的开销。

sentences.en: This renders it unnecessary for me to do anything.
sentences.cn: 这使我无需做任何事情.

sentences.en: We can’t afford any unnecessary delays.
sentences.cn: 我们经不起无谓的耽搁。

sentences.en: We edited out some unnecessary words or sentences from the draft.
sentences.cn: 我们从原稿中删去某些不必要的词句.

sentences.en: We shall have to trim away the unnecessary parts of the spending.
sentences.cn: 我们必须削减不必要的开支.

sentences.en: Williams was found guilty of causing unnecessary suffering to animals.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯因无故虐待动物被判有罪。

trans.tran_en: not needed, or more than is needed
